summary: Saya is a Japanese vampire slayer whose next mission is in a high school on a US military base in 1960s Japan, where she poses as a student. She uses a katana/samurai sword to kill vampires.
cast: Yûki Kudô|Saemi Nakamura|Joe Romersa|Rebecca Forstadt|Stuart Robinson|Akira Koieyama|Tom Fahn|Fitz Houston|Steve Blum|Paul Carr|Dave Mallow
title: Blood: El último vampiro
